translation: The objects of the senses turn away from the abstinent man, leaving the longing behind; but his longing also turns away upon seeing the Supreme.
commentary: 2.59 Objects the objects of senses? turn away turn away? Abstinent of fasting? Dehinah of the man? Rasavarjam leaving the longing? Rasa: loving (taste)? Even even? of his of his? But the Supreme? seeing having seen? withdraws turns away.Commentary Knowledge of the Self alone can destroy in toto the subtle Vasanas (latent tendencies) and all the subtle desires? all subtle attachments and even the longing
